name: Oliver's Weekend
description:
Oliver's Weekend is an interactive story book. It tells a fairy tale about caterpillar Oliver's absurd weekend journey going back home to visit his parents.

Features:
* 8 pages of game contents
* Delightful handcrafted artworks
* Challenging puzzles with hints available in the download package

Credits：
Game Design: Cheng
Story: acid_cookie
Puzzle Design: acid_cookie ilan Cheng
Art: NIanyu
Programming: Cheng
